summary: AN ORDINANCE related to the Cannon House, authorizing the Director of Housing to purchase from the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development for $5.8 million the first mortgage note on the Cannon House, to assign or release the note for $5.8 million in a simultaneous transaction with Sea Mar Community Health Center, and to execute agreements and take other actions to facilitate these transactions; declaring an emergency; and ratifying and confirming prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
